name: Monochrome (Empyreus Entertainment)
description:
Welcome to Monochrome, our next new project!
A 2.5D Platformer that uses color states, world states and jumps between 2D and 3D at pivotal points. Monochrome was inspired by a game jam game some of us made a year ago and now we are making it better. The goal of this playtest is to receive feedback on game feel, colourblindness issues, and general first impressions.

Feedback survey:  https://forms.gle/rAuWmL35Dk5Rpjb8A

https://www.empyreusentertainment.com/ https://www.instagram.com/empyreus_entertainment/ https://twitter.com/Empyreus_Games https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_ucCbcFCn8i6GO6gzbd1vA/featured https://discord.gg/kvDc2zwDYJ
